report.title: UKBMS Walks: Top level samples list for a CMS user
report.description: A list of top level samples for use in the UKBMS My Walks report calendar grid. Filtered according to the Indicia ID of the user, and optional location ID. Top level means that the parent_id field of the samples is null.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM samples s JOIN surveys su on su.id=s.survey_id and su.deleted=false LEFT JOIN (termlists_terms ttl1 INNER JOIN termlists_terms ttl2 ON ttl2.meaning_id=ttl1.meaning_id INNER JOIN terms t ON t.id=ttl2.term_id ) ON ttl1.id=s.sample_method_id LEFT JOIN locations l ON l.id=s.location_id #joins# WHERE s.deleted = FALSE AND s.parent_id IS NULL AND #website_filter# AND (CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (CAST(ttl2.id AS character varying)='#sample_method_id#' OR '#sample_method_id#'='' OR t.term='#sample_method_id#') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (CAST(l.id AS character varying)='#location_id#' OR '#location_id#' = '') #order_by#
report.field_sql: s.id as sample_id, su.title as survey, COALESCE(l.name, s.location_name) as location_name, l.id as location_id, l.code, s.entered_sref, s.date_start, s.date_end, s.date_type

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: user_id
param.description: Enter the Indicia ID of the user

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: sample_method_id
param.description: Select the sample method, or leave blank to not filter by sample method.
